sentences.english: And Rinpoche has vowed to turn off the water while brushing his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切本身则誓言在刷牙时要关闭水龙头。

sentences.english: Where first our marriage-vows were given.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿我们说过新婚的誓言。

sentences.english: Ep667 - Kexin chooses Wenqiang as her boyfriend. Yingming is very angry. He vows to take revenge on both Sichuan and Wenqiang.
sentences.chinese: 可欣决定选择文强，英明即誓言向四川和文强报复。

sentences.english: A new cassette recorder recorded their love swear.
sentences.chinese: 一台崭新的盒式磁带录音机记录下他们爱的誓言。

sentences.english: The vigilante group had vowed yesterday to extend the operation all over Central Kenya
sentences.chinese: 民团昨天曾誓言要把他们的行动扩大到肯尼亚中部。

sentences.english: Certainly, Narcissa, I shall make the Unbreakable Vow, " he said quietly."
sentences.chinese: 当然，纳西莎，我会立下牢不可破誓言。

sentences.english: However, the most common present is the exchange of love notes, known as Valentines.
sentences.chinese: 但是最常见的礼物是交换爱情誓言，称为情人卡。

sentences.english: Vietnam pledged to improve its investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 越南誓言改善其投资环境。

sentences.english: You can forget the asseveration of past, but want to remember own of sincerely.
sentences.chinese: 你可以忘记以前的誓言，但要记住自己的真心。

sentences.english: Mahmoud Abbas vowed to continue the search for a two-state solution with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴斯誓言要继续同以色列寻求两国并存的解决之道。

sentences.english: A stronger oath yet is the one that is repeated 50times.
sentences.chinese: 不过，另一种还要庄重的誓言就是重复50遍。

sentences.english: Catholic Church and is pledging to work to make sure pedophiles do not become priests.
sentences.chinese: 他誓言采取行动确保有虐童癖的人不会成为神父。

sentences.english: My followers, unlike yours, are loyal to their oaths.
sentences.chinese: 我的追随者，不像你的那样，忠于他们的誓言。

sentences.english: So now , crowned goddess, I make this vow.
sentences.chinese: 所以现在，戴着桂冠的女神，我在此立下誓言。

sentences.english: Both Yang and Dai repeated those vows to Clinton yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，杨和戴都像克林顿传达了这一誓言。

definition: to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to swear an oath (of office)/to make a vow
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
